item.title: Spoken Word Is Now as Powerful
I Only Call People More Miserable Than I
item.description: 1940 haven’t made a log in a while cause I’ve been hand writing every day cause my fucking LAPTOPS been broken for so long on and off all year and this is the fuckin year for it all and helen gets triggered when I try to drink a half bottle of wine in 10 minutes before seeing some free jazz cause I don’t wanna sneak any in and god damn I thank Craig for giving me a call cause I just got off the whatever and everyone here is so hot so rich and I told craig I’ve been a reclusive outside boyfriend art life, and then again I appreciated his call too many times, cause I didn’t realize until I said it outloud this social island period of my life can be summed up by only calling people more Miserable than me, who so far has only been kevin who hasn’t answered yet and my parents, and all while applying for grad school and looking up and forward to the future where it’s going to be really great and nice

item.description: ye weadks;l **YUP ** FBR PBD All of Us F.A.A F.A. ILLEST VILLAGE [ {}}{}{} ]
